InstructionData.Title: GFG - Simple
InstructionData.Author: Unknown
InstructionData.Instructions:
# GFG-300 # Gas Fuel Generator Controller alias GFG d0 alias Battery d1
define MINCHARGE 0.1
alias charge r0 alias activate r1
start: l charge Battery Ratio sle activate charge MINCHARGE # charge < MINCHARGE s GFG On activate
yield j start
